neighbors.name: DJS Properties L.P.
neighbors.claims: DJS Properties, L.P. was formed in 1997 by Don J. Simplot as an Idaho family limited partnership[Justia — law, 2008; "Simplot formed DJS in 1997"](https://law.justia.com/cases/federal/district-courts/idaho/iddce/1:2007cv00484/21493/14/). Simplot initially held approximately 75% ownership (2% as general partner and ~73.4% as limited partner), with the remaining interest held by a Simplot family trust and his children[Justia — law, 2008; "2% general partnership... 73.4% limited partnership"](https://law.justia.com/cases/federal/district-courts/idaho/iddce/1:2007cv00484/21493/14/). County property records list DJS Properties L.P. as the owner of numerous large farmland parcels in Payette County[Payette County Assessor — gov, retrieved 2026-02-13; "property records"](https://www.payettecounty.org/assessor/). During Don Simplot’s 2007 bankruptcy, a proposal to liquidate his stake in DJS was fiercely opposed by Simplot’s family, who argued that forcing a sale of DJS’s assets would violate the partnership agreement and destroy its value[Justia — law, 2008; "plan contemplates... interest in DJS will be sold"](https://law.justia.com/cases/federal/district-courts/idaho/iddce/1:2007cv00484/21493/14/).
neighbors.influence_justification: Long-standing Simplot family entity with expansive land holdings; led by a billionaire agribusiness family with significant political and economic connections in Idaho

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the Simplot family representative or trust manager privately to discuss mutually beneficial options; emphasize respect for their farming legacy and consider offering premium terms or partnerships to align the project with their interests

neighbors.name: B Humble Farms LLC
neighbors.claims: B Humble Farms LLC is an Idaho limited liability company that owns multiple farm parcels in Payette County[Idaho Secretary of State — gov, retrieved 2026-02-13; "business entity search"](https://sos.idaho.gov). There is no public website or media presence for this entity, suggesting it operates as a private family farm holding. No commercial liens, court cases, or political contributions were found associated with B Humble Farms LLC, indicating its activities are limited to agricultural production and land ownership[Payette County Assessor — gov, retrieved 2026-02-13; "parcel ownership"](https://www.payettecounty.org/assessor/).
neighbors.influence_justification: Small-scale local farming operation; no known broader influence or political ties beyond owning farmland

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out personally to the family owners to address any concerns about project impacts on their farm (water, soil, access); offer assurances or mitigations and highlight potential financial benefits or lease opportunities if applicable

neighbors.name: Horst Land LLC
neighbors.claims: Horst Land LLC is an Idaho limited liability company holding agricultural land in Payette County[Payette County Assessor — gov, retrieved 2026-02-13; "land ownership"](https://www.payettecounty.org/assessor/). The company appears to be a private landholding for the Horst family, with no other business operations visible in public records. There are no indications of Horst Land LLC engaging in development projects or community activism; its profile is limited to owning and managing its farm properties, and it has stayed out of local news or legal disputes related to land use.
neighbors.influence_justification: Family-owned land entity with a narrow focus; not known to hold any significant economic or political sway in the broader community

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the Horst family informally through local channels; listen to any concerns about farming or rural lifestyle impacts and emphasize measures the project will take to respect their land and operations

overview_summary: The neighboring entities are primarily agricultural landholders, including a major family farming partnership and two local farm LLCs. DJS Properties LP is tied to Idaho’s prominent Simplot family and owns extensive farmland, indicating substantial influence. B Humble Farms LLC and Horst Land LLC appear to be private family farm operations with limited public profiles, suggesting they are focused on preserving their agricultural land rather than actively engaging in development or political activities. None of these organizations are known developers or advocacy groups; their motivations likely center on land value, agricultural use, and family legacy.
